summary: A comet passes near the Earth and disturbs Earth's magnetic field.
cast: Jack Coleman|Holly Elissa|Tyler Johnston|Terry David Mulligan|Roger Cross|David Lewis|Rob Morton|Emma Lahana|Nicholas Carella|Marsha Regis|Scott Lyster|Jay Brazeau|Dean Redman|Donovan Cerminara|Brent Stait|Kurt Max Runte|Darren Moore
title: Tormenta magnética
